translation: Roe mbark czkrvvun byyhi pihrun byyis ṭrfs kun.
Yicziy kthhi khạṭrh kh āv timn nishhi aakh mʿdhvr aʿmyā.
Tohyhi kus chyz zạnhi ravi kh tuhnzi tʿlymhi sintụ̄ dyv suh drst th pạkyzh spdihe.
Nth rtthi he nṣyḥt tuhund klami shryf bvuzith, ps diyhi ha tas nfʿ tuhundi zbani mbark nṣyḥt bvzin.
Lykn yus shkhṣ dyni ḥqh nishhi be prvah chhu lagan,
Tvhụ̄ chhiv tas kun mtvjh spdan, (tsnz fkr thavan)
Tohyhi petth chhunh kanhh baz khvast hrgah tim pak spdn nh.
Lykn yus tohyhi kun dvran dvran chhu bkmali shvq v mḥbt yivan.
Khoczan khoczan (ʿbd Allah abn am mktvm sndụ̄ pạtthụ̄.)
Ps chhiv tvhụ̄ tas kun be aʿtnaʿy kran.
Btḥqyq be shk chih yim qrāni mjydkụ̄ āyati krymh vʿẓ th nṣyḥt.
Pas yas khosh kri suh rratthi nṣyḥt, (tamiyuk fạydh vatys pans, mghrvr v mtkbrn hndi nh mannh sintụ̄ amhi kis ʿzts mnz km kynhh gczihh nh, kyazi yhi qrāni mjyd chhu)
Timne vrqn andr lykhith yimn setthah ʿzt krnh āmut chhu.
Yim blnd mrtbh chhi, yim pak v pạkyzh chhi.
Yus lykhnh āmut chhu ʿzth valyn mlạykn hndyv aathv.
Yim nykv kar chhi.
Tbah gczihn yhi ansan kvtah kfrani nʿmt krvun chhu suh, (kmyuk sna ghrvr chhu tas suh chhuna vuchhan)
Kamhi ḥqyr chyzh nishhi kvr Allah tʿālyā hn pạdh?
Ābi mny nishhi pạdh kvrun suh, tvpth krnas tann hund andazh.
Tvpth krụ̄ ns majhi hndi shkmh mnz nyrnch vath āsan.
Tvpth kynhh kalah zndh thạvith mvrun suh, tvpth vatnvvun qbri mnz.
Tvpth yylhi yyczihh suh tylhi krys dvbarh byyhi pạdh.
Btḥqyq amụ̄ ansann kr nh pvur so kạm yymuyk ḥkm kryvs khạlqi brḥqn.
Ps vuchhin ansan ʿbrt chhi nẓri pnnis ghdhahs th khyns kun, (asụ̄ kithh pạtthụ̄ chhi amụ̄ sndụ̄ khordny hindụ̄ chyz mhya kran)
Aasy trvv hyrmhi ṭrfh ʿjyb ṭryqh rvud.
Tvpth phattuv aasy zmyn ʿjyb ṭryqh, byvl trạvith krrnạv tamhi mnz kulụ̄.
Ps khvr aashi tamhi zmyn mnz ghlh.
Byyhi dachh byyhi trkari,
Byyhi zytvn byyhi khzr,
Byyhi kulyv brith bagh,
Byyhi myvh byyhi gash.
Tuhndi nfʿ khạṭrh byyhi tuhndyn charvayn hndi nfʿ khạṭrh.
Adh yylhi gczihh so krykh yosh knn zar pavvunụ̄ āshi yʿny pvguk dvyum phokh tamhi doh spdn ʿjyb ʿjyb ḥalat ẓạhr.
Yymhi doh shkhṣ czalhi pnnis bạyis nishhi.
Pnnhi majhi th mạlis nishhi.
Pnnhi znanhi nishhi th nychvyn nishhi.
Yimav andrh āshi tamhi doh prth akis pnny fkrah yosh tas be nyaz kri be snzi fkri nishhi.
Kynhh buthụ̄ āsn tamhi doh pholh vunụ̄.
Aash vunụ̄ th khosh yʿny ba aymann hind buth.
Byyhi āsn kynhh buthụ̄ tamhi doh grd ālvudh.
Timne āshi valnh āmcz syạhy.
Time ge kạfr th bdkar nafrman.
